avalancheActivity.comment:
Weak layers in the old snowpack can be released in isolated cases and mostly by large additional loads, especially on very steep shady slopes along the border with France and along the border between Valais and Italy.
The avalanches can be released in the faceted old snow and reach medium size.
The older wind slabs can still be released in some cases above approximately 2200 m. Caution is to be exercised in gullies and bowls, and behind abrupt changes in the terrain, as well as at transitions from a shallow to a deep snowpack.

Gradual increase in danger of dry and moist avalanches as a consequence of warming, in particular on rocky sunny slopes, as well as at the base of rock walls.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Individual avalanche prone locations for dry avalanches are to be found on very steep slopes above approximately 2100 m. Slight increase in danger as a consequence of warming during the day and solar radiation.

snowpackStructure.comment:
The wind slabs are bonding only slowly with the old snowpack in particular on shady slopes above the tree line.
Towards its base, the snowpack is faceted and weak.
In particular steep sunny slopes as well as below approximately 1900 m: As a consequence of mild temperatures and solar radiation a crust formed on the surface during the last few days.
Snow depths vary greatly, depending on the infuence of the wind. Adjacent to ridgelines and in pass areas at elevated altitudes hardly any snow is lying.

tendency.highlights: As a consequence of rising temperatures and the mostly light wind, the snow drift accumulations will stabilise during the next few days.

avalancheActivity.comment:
By Tuesday wind slabs formed adjacent to ridgelines and in gullies and bowls. These can as before be released by people and reach medium size. This applies especially at transitions from a shallow to a deep snowpack, as well as at transitions into gullies and bowls.
The avalanches can be released in the faceted old snow and reach large size in isolated cases. Caution is to be exercised on very steep slopes.

Gradual increase in danger of dry and moist avalanches as a consequence of warming during the day and solar radiation. Below approximately 2800 m small and medium-sized moist snow slides and avalanches are possible, in particular on rocky sunny slopes, as well as at the base of rock walls.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Wind slabs and weakly bonded old snow require caution. The danger of dry and moist avalanches will increase a little during the day.

snowpackStructure.comment:
The wind slabs are bonding only slowly with the old snowpack in particular on shady slopes above the tree line.
Towards its base, the snowpack is faceted and weak.
In all aspects snow depths vary greatly at high altitudes and in high Alpine regions, depending on the infuence of the wind.
At low altitude from a snow sport perspective, in most cases insufficient snow is lying.

tendency.highlights: The weather conditions will facilitate a slow strengthening of the snow drift accumulations.

avalancheActivity.comment:
The more recent wind slabs can still be released in some cases especially on extremely steep shady slopes above approximately 2100 m. Caution is to be exercised in particular along the border with France and along the border between Valais and Italy.
Weak layers in the old snowpack can be released in isolated cases and mostly by large additional loads.
As a consequence of warming during the day, the likelihood of moist avalanches being released will increase a little on rocky sunny slopes. Thus far only isolated mostly small dry and moist avalanches are possible.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Individual avalanche prone locations are to be found in steep terrain at elevated altitudes.

snowpackStructure.comment:
The wind slabs of last week are lying on unfavourable layers in particular on shady slopes above approximately 2100 m. Towards its base, the snowpack is faceted and weak.
In high Alpine regions snow depths vary greatly, depending on the infuence of the wind. The wind was moderate to strong in the vicinity of peaks.
Also at intermediate and high altitudes thus far only a little snow is lying.

avalancheActivity.comment:
The avalanche prone locations are very rare.
On very steep shady slopes individual dry snow slides and avalanches are possible, but they will be mostly small.
avalancheActivity.highlights: In all altitude zones from a snow sport perspective, in most cases insufficient snow is lying.

snowpackStructure.comment:
The old snowpack is faceted and weak.
In high Alpine regions snow depths vary greatly, depending on the infuence of the wind.
Also at intermediate and high altitudes hardly any snow is lying.
